title: Strategy Tabs (Sub-Documents)
spec:
## Strategy Tabs (Sub-Documents)

### Goal
Allow a strategy to contain multiple tabs/sub-documents for different aspects (ICP Research, Competitive Analysis, Messaging Framework, etc.).

### Behavior
- **Tab bar**: Horizontal tabs below the strategy header
- **Default tabs**: Overview, ICP, Competition, Messaging, Playbook
- **Custom tabs**: User can add/rename/reorder/delete tabs
- **Per-tab AI context**: AI is aware of which tab is active and its content
- **Cross-tab references**: AI can reference content from other tabs in responses

### Technical Approach
- `strategy_tabs` table: `id`, `strategy_id`, `name`, `order`, `content` (JSONB), `created_at`
- Default tabs created with new strategy
- Drag-and-drop reorder via `@dnd-kit/sortable`
- AI context: include active tab content + tab names in system prompt
- Depends on MULTI (multi-strategy) for the strategy model changes

### Acceptance Criteria
- Given a new strategy, 5 default tabs are created
- Given a user adds a custom tab "LinkedIn Playbook", it appears in the tab bar
- Given the user is on the Competition tab, the AI references competitive data when answering
